data.message: I'd like to know why my account language was changed twice in one week?  I filed a report and haven't heard anything yet.  I did change my password each time.

replies.message: Hi AnnaLee. If you have reported this issue to our team, please sit tight while we take the time to review it. Rest assured that we are looking into all the reports that we receive. Thanks for your patience. -Jordan
Check bottom left side of page theres a language button..easy fix AnnaLee Camidge :)

Stu Nill It's a little hard to know what to click on when you don't read or understand a different language.  Thankfully my son had his computer and we were able to figure out where to go and what to do.
someone has hacked my fb id..he changed my primary email and also my mobile number.Kindly tell me the way how to delete my account and submit the complain

I'm not a computer expert, but I think you can click on the downward arrow located just right of where it says home in the dark blue section.  There should be a place for settings and something that says help.  Also something that says "Report a Problem".
